actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Federal Power Commission to allocate scarce supplies of natural gas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Power Commission to allocate natural gas supplies when a shortage of such supplies threatens the public health, safety or welfare. Requires such an allocation to be equitable among all geographic areas and economic sectors. Terminates such allocation authority on July 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Federal Power Commission to allocate scarce supplies of natural gas.
